entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening and ending after midnight. Clearing before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then snow or rain. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow or rain with risk of freezing rain. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
